module.name: IntfGraphics
module.short: Classes and functions for easy handling of raw images (interface images)

element.name: TLazIntfImage
element.short: Represents a graphical image.

descr.p: This descendant of TFPCustomImage stores the image data as TRawImage, and is therefore able to interchange images directly with the LCL interfaces.
A large number of the protected methods (GetColorxxxxxx and SetColorxxxxxx) deal with direct interface to the operating system at the pixel level

element.name: TLazIntfImage.SetSize
element.short: SetSize - define the height and width of the image

element.name: TLazIntfImage.CheckDescription
element.short: CheckDescription - looks at the supplied Image Description record and returns True if it matches the actual properties of the image
element.errors: Generates an exception if an error is encountered in the image description

element.name: TLazIntfImage.LoadFromDevice
element.short: LoadFromDevice - loads the image from the device with specified handle

element.name: TLazIntfImage.LoadFromBitmap
element.short: LoadFromBitmap - loads the image from a Bitmap

element.name: TLazIntfImage.GetXYDataPostion
element.short: GetXYDataPostion - finds the position of the raw image

element.name: TLazIntfImage.GetXYMaskPostion
element.short: GetXYMaskPostion - finds the position of the raw image mask

element.name: TLazIntfImage.PixelData
element.short: PixelData - the raw data for the current pixel

element.name: TLazIntfImage.MaskData
element.short: MaskData - the raw mask data for the current pixel

element.name: TLazIntfImage.DataDescription
element.short: DataDescription - the raw description record for the current image

element.name: TLazIntfImage.TColors
element.short: TColors - the colours available for the present position

element.name: TLazIntfImageMask
element.short: TLazIntfImageMask - applying a mask at the Raw Image level

element.name: TLazIntfImageMask.Image
element.short: Image - the image to which masking is applied

element.name: TLazAVLPalette
element.short: TLazAVLPalette - this descendant of TFPPalette uses an AVL tree for speed up

element.name: TLazReaderXPM
element.short: TLazReaderXPM - this is a FPImage reader for xpm images

element.name: TLazWriterXPM
element.short: TLazWriterXPM - this is a FPImage writer for xpm images

element.name: TLazReaderBMP
element.short: TLazReaderBMP - This is an improved FPImage reader for bmp images

element.name: TLazIntfImage.CreateBitmaps
element.short: CreateBitmaps - generates a Bitmap from the image data

element.name: TLazIntfImage.AlphaFromMask
element.short: AlphaFromMask - gets the alpha value from the mask if AKeepAlpha is True (default condition)

element.name: TLazIntfImage.Masked
element.short: Masked - whether the image mask applies at the current position

element.name: ILazImageReader
element.short: ILazImageReader - extension to TFPCustomImageReader to initialize a TRawImgeDescription based on the image to be read

element.name: TLazReaderIconDIB
element.short: TLazReaderIconDIB - this is a FPImage reader for a single DIB from an icon file

element.name: TLazIntfImage.GetDataLineStart
element.short: Returns an pointer to the scanline raw data.
